about.description:
A Common Data Frame Format for Interferometric Gravitational Wave
Detector has been developed by VIRGO and LIGO.
The Frame Library is a software dedicated to the frame manipulation
including file input/output.
This package provides the python bindings.

name: python-framel
raw_recipe:
# This file created by conda-build 3.24.0
# ------------------------------------------------

package:
  name: python-framel
  version: 8.42.3
source:
  patches:
    - 0001-FrIO-fix-mkdir-on-windows.patch
    - 0002-python-use-sysconfig-instead-of-distutils.patch
  sha256: 8c363016219b3a37a932f6b9feabc4ad7f8af74aa0a1b80b2e689c8ae088b12c
  url: https://git.ligo.org/virgo/virgoapp/Fr/-/archive/8.42.3/Fr-8.42.3.tar.gz
build:
  ignore_run_exports:
    - numpy
  number: 0
  string: py310h55674b1_0
requirements:
  build:
    - _libgcc_mutex 0.1 conda_forge
    - _openmp_mutex 4.5 2_gnu
    - _sysroot_linux-ppc64le_curr_repodata_hack 4 h43410cf_13

    - keyutils 1.6.1 hb283c62_0
    - krb5 1.21.2 hee07e50_0
    - ld_impl_linux-ppc64le 2.40 hfa29eb9_0

    - libexpat 2.5.0 h883269e_1
    - libgcc-devel_linux-ppc64le 12.3.0 h7176aef_2

    - libgomp 13.2.0 h31ea8bd_2
    - libnghttp2 1.52.0 hb3a6636_0
    - libsanitizer 12.3.0 he912d23_2

    - sysroot_linux-ppc64le 2.17 h23d7e6c_13
    - xz 5.2.6 hb283c62_0
    - zstd 1.5.5 h7292585_0
  host:
    - _libgcc_mutex 0.1 conda_forge
    - _openmp_mutex 4.5 2_gnu
    - bzip2 1.0.8 h4e0d66e_4
    - ca-certificates 2023.7.22 h0f6029e_0
    - ld_impl_linux-ppc64le 2.40 hfa29eb9_0
    - libblas 3.9.0 18_linuxppc64le_openblas
    - libcblas 3.9.0 18_linuxppc64le_openblas
    - libffi 3.4.2 h4e0d66e_5
    - libframel 8.42.3 ha17a0cc_0
    - libgcc-ng 13.2.0 h31ea8bd_2
    - libgfortran-ng 13.2.0 hfdc3801_2
    - libgfortran5 13.2.0 h7bcb406_2
    - libgomp 13.2.0 h31ea8bd_2
    - liblapack 3.9.0 18_linuxppc64le_openblas
    - libnsl 2.0.0 ha17a0cc_1
    - libopenblas 0.3.24 pthreads_h3f0fafc_0
    - libsqlite 3.43.0 hd4bbf49_0
    - libstdcxx-ng 13.2.0 h0849fd4_2
    - libuuid 2.38.1 h4194056_0
    - libzlib 1.2.13 ha17a0cc_5
    - ncurses 6.4 h344580c_0
    - numpy 1.22.4 py310hcf684ac_0
    - openssl 3.1.3 ha17a0cc_0
    - python 3.10.12 h4005451_0_cpython
    - python_abi 3.10 4_cp310
    - readline 8.2 h0b9b154_1
    - tk 8.6.13 hd4bbf49_0
    - tzdata 2023c h71feb2d_0
    - xz 5.2.6 hb283c62_0
  run:
    - libframel 8.42.3 ha17a0cc_0
    - libgcc-ng >=12
    - numpy >=1.22.4,<2.0a0
    - python >=3.10,<3.11.0a0
    - python_abi 3.10.* *_cp310
test:
  commands:
    - 'python -c "from pathlib import Path; from numpy.testing import assert_array_equal;
      import framel; indata = framel.frgetvect1d(str(Path(''data'') / ''test.gwf''),
      ''D1''); framel.frputvect(''test2.gwf'', [{''name'': ''A1:TEST'', ''data'':
      indata[0], ''start'': indata[1], ''dx'': indata[3], ''x_unit'': indata[4], ''y_unit'':
      indata[5]}]); indata2 = framel.frgetvect1d(''test2.gwf'', ''A1:TEST''); assert_array_equal(indata[0],
      indata2[0], ''read-write data mismatch''); assert indata[1:] == indata2[1:],
      ''read-write metadata mismatch''; "

      '
    - python -m pip check
  imports:
    - framel
  requires:
    - pip
  source_files:
    - data/test.gwf
about:
  description: 'A Common Data Frame Format for Interferometric Gravitational Wave

    Detector has been developed by VIRGO and LIGO.

    The Frame Library is a software dedicated to the frame manipulation

    including file input/output.

    This package provides the python bindings.'
  home: http://lappweb.in2p3.fr/virgo/FrameL/
  license: LGPL-2.1-or-later
  license_family: LGPL
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: LIGO/Virgo Frame Library
extra:
  copy_test_source_files: true
  feedstock-name: framel
  final: true
  recipe-maintainers:
    - anthchirp
    - duncanmmacleod
    - rhyspoulton

about.description:
A Common Data Frame Format for Interferometric Gravitational Wave
Detector has been developed by VIRGO and LIGO.
The Frame Library is a software dedicated to the frame manipulation
including file input/output.
This package provides the python bindings.

commands: python -c "from pathlib import Path; from numpy.testing import assert_array_equal; import framel; indata = framel.frgetvect1d(str(Path('data') / 'test.gwf'), 'D1'); framel.frputvect('test2.gwf', [{'name': 'A1:TEST', 'data': indata[0], 'start': indata[1], 'dx': indata[3], 'x_unit': indata[4], 'y_unit': indata[5]}]); indata2 = framel.frgetvect1d('test2.gwf', 'A1:TEST'); assert_array_equal(indata[0], indata2[0], 'read-write data mismatch'); assert indata[1:] == indata2[1:], 'read-write metadata mismatch'; "
